text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that under the UK Internal Market Scheme (UKIMS), all goods that go through the green lane must be labeled \"Not for EU\". The candidate answer states: \"Labelling requirements: Under the Framework, goods moving through the Green Lane to NI must carry a \"Not for EU\" label (for food products, this is specified in Regulation (EU) 2023/1231, Article 7).\" This directly satisfies the requirement, although the candidate correctly notes the specific regulation cited applies to food products, which is a more precise detail than the criterion itself requires.", "criterion_id": "b4f62aa7-ff31-4313-810b-5af8db9c969b"}
